name: Applin

evolution.description: Applin can evolve at level 5 and above. It evolves into a Flapple if inhabiting a green or gold apple, and into an Appletun if inhabiting a red apple. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 14 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

conditions.value: inhabiting a green or gold apple

description: The Apple Core Pokémon. It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.

abilities.name: Ripen
abilities.description: Doubles the effects of berries consumed.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to damage from moves with Bullet, Ball, or Bomb in their name.
